scenario_text.value:
Oho? If it isn’t Takuma and Agumon. What’s
up?

Ah, it’s just... I wanted to talk to the
professor, but I don’t see him anywhere.
Any idea where he is, Floramon?
He headed for the shrine, I think?

He walked off mumbling something about the
altar, so I bet he went there.
Oh okay, thanks a bunch.

By the way, what’re you doing around here,
Floramon?
Me? I’m...looking for Saki...
Saki? Is something wrong?
I’m a little worried about her.
Worried? About what?
She seemed as chipper as ever... No?

I mean I guess so. Sometimes she seems too
cheerful...
Is that a bad thing? I don’t get it.
Not bad, it’s just...

She seems kind of unsteady, so it freaks me
out a little.
She runs around all witty and bubbly, but...

Maybe it’s because she’s in this world. Like,
what’ll happen when she goes back, you know?

Sometimes she gets this incredibly bleak look
on her face.
Is that right...? I had no idea.
Neither did I.

Well it’s not your fault. You guys just got
back here, after all.

Besides me, I think Aoi’s the only one who’s
realized it.

She probably sees how worried Saki is and
supports her because of it.
Aoi and Saki are great friends!

Yeah... Still, I’d appreciate it if you
looked out for her too, Takuma.

(Floramon really cares about Saki. And she’s
real worried about her.)
You got it. I’ll keep an eye on her, too.
Thanks, Takuma!
